rows.label: tlk42300012_01_msg0001
rows.name:
It seems like a good idea to move
during battle and try to get to the
enemy's side or behind them, mo!

rows.label: tlk42300012_01_msg0002
rows.name:
Tondon can use this knowledge... to
help with repairs in Goldmund, mo.

rows.label: tlk42300012_01_msg0003
rows.name:
For a nail that's hard to
drive in from the front,
hit it from the side, mo!

rows.label: tlk42300012_01_msg0004
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ] I feel like the nail
would just bend...
